data.title: Pipalyatjara and Kalka (2015)
data.meta_description: The untold story of indigenous exodus from religious institutionalisation to cultural freedom in the remote central desert of Australia. An emotional tale of human sacrifice, pioneering adventure and interracial love. This is a short version of an in-production full-length documentary.
data.text:
The untold story of indigenous exodus from religious institutionalisation to cultural freedom in the remote central desert of Australia. An emotional tale of human sacrifice, pioneering adventure and interracial love. This is a short version of an in-production full-length documentary.

Screen Australia acknowledges the Traditional Custodians of the land on which we work and recognises their continuous connection to culture, community, land, waters and territories.

Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people are advised that this website contains images, voices and names of people who have passed.

Third party web links are provided for your convenience only. Screen Australia is not responsible for and does not endorse any Third Party Sites' use, effect or content or any associated organisation, product or service on the third party site.
